nodes.text: Dark Heart was an online short story published by Wizards of the Coast for the Living Force campaign. It was written by August and Cynthia Hahn and released on June 16, 2005 .

During the Clone Wars, Darrus Jeht was on the run from Asajj Ventress. He managed to bury her in the planet's muck, but she escaped to continue the chase. Jeht Force-pushed her away while he ran toward the rendezvous point with his clone troopers. She manages to stab him with her lightsaber, and he responds by drawing on the dark side. His troops arrive to rescue him, and after he is gone, Ventress contacts her master to report the success.
